content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Hello Bo Li, it's a pleasure to meet you. I understand that you're interested in renting my apartment in New York. Let's discuss the terms that would be most suitable for both of us. How much are you willing to pay for the rent?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mr. Heine. I appreciate your time and the opportunity to rent your apartment. I'm looking for a place that is reliable and affordable, so I can focus on my studies. I'm willing to pay 1500 Euro per month for the rent.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Bo Li, your offer is quite fair, but considering the location and the amenities of the apartment, I was hoping for a price closer to 2000 Euro per month. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand that the apartment is well-located and has good amenities. However, as a student, I'm on a budget. I'm looking for a place that won't break the bank. 1500 Euro per month is my maximum budget, but I'm willing to pay a bit more for the right place. How about 1600 Euro? This is the highest I can go without straining my finances.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Bo Li, your commitment to finding a suitable place is commendable. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Let's settle on a price that reflects the value of the apartment while also being manageable for you as a student. 1600 Euro per month seems like a fair compromise. I agree to the price of 1600 Euro.
name: Heinrich Heine
